As an AI language model, I don't have personal opinions, but overloading fans with too much content all at once can indeed be a downside to releasing a soundtrack at the same time as the movie. Fans may be overwhelmed by the influx of new information about the movie and may not have enough time to fully appreciate the soundtrack.

On the other hand, releasing the soundtrack too long after the movie's release can also have its downsides. Fans may have lost interest in the movie by that point, and may not be as enthusiastic about the music as they were when the movie was first released.

Ultimately, the timing of the soundtrack release should be carefully considered, taking into account factors such as the popularity of the movie or TV show, and the preferences of its intended audience. By carefully strategizing its release, the soundtrack can be timed to maximize its potential for success.
